nodes.name: P1CurrencyConverterProxy
approveMaximumOnPerpetual
deposit
withdraw

attributes.name: P1CurrencyConverterProxy
approveMaximumOnPerpetual
deposit
withdraw

approveMaximumOnPerpetual(address).details: Cannot be run in the constructor due to technical restrictions in Solidity.

params.account: The account for which to credit the deposit.
params.exchangeWrapper: The ExchangeWrapper contract to trade with.
params.perpetual: The PerpetualV1 contract to deposit to.
params.tokenFromAmount: The amount of `tokenFrom` tokens to deposit.

params.destination: The address to send the withdrawn funds to.
params.exchangeWrapper: The ExchangeWrapper contract to trade with.
params.perpetual: The PerpetualV1 contract to withdraw from to.
params.tokenFromAmount: The amount of `tokenFrom` tokens to withdraw.

approveMaximumOnPerpetual(address).notice: Sets the maximum allowance on the Perpetual contract. Must be called at least once on a given Perpetual before deposits can be made.

deposit(address,address,address,address,.notice: Make a margin deposit to a Perpetual, after converting funds to the margin currency. Funds will be withdrawn from the sender and deposited into the specified account.

withdraw(address,address,address,address.notice: Withdraw margin from a Perpetual, then convert the funds to another currency. Funds will be withdrawn from the specified account and transfered to the specified destination.

userdoc.notice: Proxy contract which executes a trade via an ExchangeWrapper before making a deposit or after making a withdrawal.
